import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useRef} from "react"; export const LoginChild = ({loginParameters}) => { const email = useRef(null); const password = useRef(null); function execute() { loginParameters.event(email.current.value, password.current.value) } return (

{loginParameters.title}

{loginParameters.subtitle}

Vous n'avez pas encore de compte ? S'inscrire.
) }
